title: Does anyone know how to reduce lag?
body: Just in lane I lag like crazy and when I get into a team fight, my best bet is to just button mash and hope for the best. I've tried muting sound but it doesn't do much. Does anyone have any further suggestions? This lag is really affecting my gameplay-my match history clearly shows it. Also, lol being the totally extremely positive community that it is doesn't help.

replies.body:
If you could be more specific that would be great. Are we talking packet loss lag? Ping lag? FPS lag?

If it's connection issues then LagReport is a good place to start: 
https://lagreport.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

This page here also has the common fixes which may help you:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here
The kind of lag I'm getting is because of FPS, my FPS is like 17. It's really annoying. My internet connection is fine it's just my FPS.

Ok FPS lag can be caused by a boatload of things, but the two most common:

Are you graphics drivers up to date? If not update them.

Do you have a high end machine? https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/GlIAFKNQ-fps-drops-data-gathering

Past that, you'd be looking at the troubleshooting in this article:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting
